name: Ragnarök TD
description:
RAGNARÖK TD
Ragnarök TD is a 2D top-down tower defense game created as a case study of Ninja Kiwi's Bloons TD 6. Follow the story of a small village in the North as they fend off the beasts of Ragnarök.

WOLVERINESOFT STUDIO
Ragnarök TD was originally created by a 13-person team at the University of Michigan's WolverineSoft Studio, a semester-long voluntary student games studio. This project was in development from September 19th, to December 10th, 2021. Additionally, a 10-person team added on to this project to be a true multiplayer game from September 19th, to December 10th, 2022.

RAGNARÖK TD UPDATES (STEAM VERSION)
*Play with Friends: You can now invite your friends to play together through Steam in a new multiplayer co-op mode.
*Control Your Territory: Place towers in your section of the map and collaborate with your friend to strategically defeat enemies.
*Send & Receive Currency: Share resources with your partner to buy towers and make upgrades.
*Chat with Friends: Communicate with your friends in-game to make decisions.
*Earn Achievements: Earn Steam badges for completing accomplishments and show them off to your friends.
